name: Moore
info:
A Sinner adept at defending, can block 2 enemies at once.
When the battle begins, [Matrix] is provided to the two allied Sinners beside Moore. If there are less than two allied Sinners beside Moore, Moore herself will gain [Matrix].

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Boundary Line
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: Every [Matrix] increases the Physical Damage of all allied units within range by 10% / 15% / 20%.

ecbFlavourText: "She's a nice girl, warm and sunny; just seeing her is enough to brighten up a gloomy day."

shackles.title: Data Recovery
shackles.description: [Matrix] additionally restores 1.5% of Moore's Max HP every second to all allied units within range.

shackles.title: Enhanced Amplification
shackles.description: Within the duration of [Emergency Service Breaker], damage dealt and buff effects of [Matrix] are increased by #50%.#

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: Moore gains 18 energy at the start of battle.

media.title: [Eng CC] 2nd Anniversary S-rank Endura | Moore "Cybersecurity Expert" Character Trailer
media.author: Jiu Jiu subs

skills.name: Automatic Information Scraper
skills.description: Moore commands her mechanical assistant to attack, each hit dealing (Max HP * 3%) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Dynamic Defence Matrix
skills.description:
Moore constructs [Matrix] for an allied unit. When Ultimate is used again on an allied unit with [Matrix], additionally deal (Max HP * 25%) Physical Damage and X Core Damage to all enemies in a 3x3 area around all existing [Matrix] on-field.
[Dynamic Defence Matrix] can be charged up to X times.

[Matrix]: Every time this is constructed, gain a (Max HP * 15%) shield, stacking up to X% of Mooreâ€™s Max HP. [Matrix] shields damage for all allied units within a single grid, disappearing once the shield is depleted. Up to two [Matrix] can exist on-field at the same time.

upgrade.description: Damage coefficient increases to $0%. Shield coefficient increases to $0%.

skills.name: Emergency Service Breaker
skills.description:
Unlocks second Ultimate [Emergency Service Breaker].
Moore commands existing [Matrix] on-field to provide (Max HP * 15%) shield, then expands the effective range of [Matrix] to a 3x3 area, providing all allies within range immunity to control effects, lasting for 6 seconds. If the shield value of [Matrix] is completely depleted within this duration, [Matrix] will only disappear after the duration ends.

upgrade.description: Shield coefficient increases to $0%. Duration increases to $0.

skills.name: Proactive Defence System
skills.description: Every [Matrix] will deal (Max HP * 1.5%) Physical Damage every second to all enemies within range.

criminalRecord: The backbone of Nirvana Cybersecurity Centre, possessing outstanding network-related knowledge and skills. One of the first personnel to issue warnings about the dark web. Ever since the Gray Mirror incident, the subject became involved with the MBCC in conducting a series of investigative operations against the dark web, providing technical support.
mutationAssessment: The subject's ability is [Information Mania Enhancement]. The external traits of this ability are not obvious; investigation shows that the subject's intellect and information processing capabilities are greatly enhanced by Mania. The subject is able to utilise their technical skills and special equipment to create a unique, tangible firewall constructed of digitised Mania. This firewall is able to provide a complete defence against the vast majority of known attack types.
